_header: As Christ and his disciples dear / Went about in this world here
_description: Gospel for Tenth Sunday after Trinity, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: …Vnto god gude wuningstedeWith haly werkes and haly bede…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Here lete vs lorde so forto lifþat we oure gaste to him may giff
BLHar4196.Note: Begins imperfectly due to missing quire between folios 107 and 108.
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.50-55.
